scripts.docs: jsdoc controllers/ models/ routes/ middleware/ utils/ *.js -d docs -r
scripts.docs:watch: jsdoc controllers/ models/ routes/ middleware/ utils/ *.js -d docs -r --watch
scripts.build: npm install && cd scripts && (python3 -m pip install --break-system-packages -r requirements.txt || python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt || echo 'Python dependencies installation skipped')
scripts.postinstall: cd scripts && if [ -d 'venv' ]; then echo 'Venv exists, skipping Python install'; elif [ -z "$RENDER" ]; then echo 'Local environment - skipping Python install (use venv)'; else python3 -m pip install --user -r requirements.txt || echo 'Python install skipped'; fi
